features: Dove Men plusCare Dermacare Scalp Dandruff Defense Fortifying Shampoo and Conditioner is designed specifically for men with fine and thinning hair, or concerned about hair loss
Improves scalp health and leaves hair flake free no visible flakes with regular use
With Caffeine and Pyrithione Zinc to help strengthen hair, leaving it visibly healthy, thicker, and resilient
Goes well with: Dove Men plusCare Control Gel, Dove Men plusCare Hydration Balance Body Wash, and Dove Men plusCare Cool Silver Dry Spray Antiperspirant
body.description: Dove Men + Care Fortifying 2-in-1 Shampoo + Conditioners make hair stronger and more resilient so that men can pursue their active lifestyles. Dove Men+Care Dermacare Scalp Dandruff Defense Shampoo + Conditioner is designed specifically for men that want dandruff relief. With regular use, the formula, with caffeine, improves men’s scalp health and helps eliminate flakes with Pyrithione Zinc. It also helps strengthen hair, leaving it visibly healthy, thicker and resilient, while helping to control and eliminate dandruff flakes. It is a dual 2-in-1 formula that functions as a shampoo and conditioner so that it cleanses and conditions simultaneously, leaving men’s hair stronger and more resilient against breakage, and helping to flake eliminate flakes. It is available in the following sizes: 12 oz and 25.4 oz. Great hair care doesn’t stop in the shower! Complete your hair care regimen and get the perfect look with the Dove Men + Care Sculpting Paste for a natural look, Defining Pomade for a sleek and polished finish, or Control Gel for all-day hold. Use it with the entire line of Dove Men + Care products for the perfect grooming regimen, such as Dove Men + Care Hydration Balance Body Wash and Dove Men + Care Cool Silver Dry Spray Antiperspirant.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DOVE MEN + CARE 2-in-1 Anti-Dandruff Shampoo and Conditioner Oil Balance DOVE MEN + CARE 2-in-1 Anti-Dandruff Shampoo and Conditioner Itch Relief DOVE MEN + CARE 2 in 1 Shampoo and Conditioner Dandruff Defense Product Benefits Dove Men+Care DermaCare Scalp Oil Balance 2-in-1 Shampoo and Conditioner is engineered for men's hair with a greasy scalp, to remove excess oil and leave hair flake-free with regular use. T Dove Men+Care DermaCare Scalp Itch Relief 2-in-1 Shampoo and Conditioner is engineered for men's hair to hydrate and soothe dry and itchy scalp and leave hair flake-free with regular use. Dove Men + Care Fortifying 2-in-1 Shampoo + Conditioners make hair stronger and more resilient so that men can pursue their active lifestyles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid Product & Price
reviews.reviewText: Walmart and others are carrying less branded products to give their store brands, with lower prices and much higher margins more shelf space. Grocery stores did this: Safeway sells 99 store brands all well below brand quality (the cookies nearly choked me). Walmart less so, with sometimes superior house brands, but less variety. I can't ship these products at Walgreens or CVS, the prices are often 2x more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have only used Head and Shoulders prior to trying this brand. I am now a loyal customer of this product - feels clean, good scent and no flakes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Justo lo que Ordené
reviews.reviewText: Tal cual lo solicite así llego a mis manos el pedido!!! Muchas Gracias!!! Lo volveré a comprar!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars great value, not packaged the best
reviews.reviewText: the product is great, and the bundle is a great value....one of the bottles broke and leaked all over....I was able to clean it up and use most of the broken bottle....but not a handy way for a package to arrive

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the future. Goin to be a clean, fresh future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is the only shampoo that my husband uses so I’m happy to have found multiple bottles at once. The only place I could find it was at Walmart and the price for one bottle was slightly more expensive. He jokes that now he has enough shampoo to last until next Christmas when I gift him more shampoo 🤪

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I see less dandruff and he is less itchy now

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Does the job perfectly I feel nice and clean after using this dove product.
